languages.text: "Азуриан не оставит свое дитя в столь темный час, элантах. Я в это верю".
"Asuryan will not abandon his child in such a dark hour, elantach. I am sure of it."
languages.original_text: "Азуриан не оставит свое дитя в столь темный час, элантах. Я в это верю".

traits.locale_text: Asuryan will not leave his children in such a dark hour, elantach. I'm sure of it."
Asuryan will not leave his children in such a dark hour, elantach. I'm sure of it."
"Asuryan will not abandon his child in such a dark hour, elantach. I am sure of it."
"Asuryan will not abandon his child in such a dark hour, elantach. I am sure of it."
"Asuryan will not abandon his child in such a dark hour, elantach. I am sure of it."

languages.text: “阿苏焉不会在至暗时刻遗弃他的子嗣，外界人。我坚信这一点。”
languages.original_text: "Asuryan will not abandon his child in such a dark hour, elantach. I am sure of it."

traits.locale_text: “阿苏焉不会在至暗时刻遗弃他的子嗣，外界人。我坚信这一点。”

languages.text: «Asuryan no abandonará a su hija en un momento tan aciago, elantach. Estoy convencida de ello».
languages.original_text: "Asuryan will not abandon his child in such a dark hour, elantach. I am sure of it."

traits.locale_text: «Asuryan no abandonará a su hija en un momento tan aciago, elantach. Estoy convencida de ello».

languages.text: « Asuryan n'abandonnera pas son enfant dans une situation aussi terrible, elantach. J'en suis certaine. »
languages.original_text: "Asuryan will not abandon his child in such a dark hour, elantach. I am sure of it."

traits.locale_text: « Asuryan n'abandonnera pas son enfant dans une situation aussi terrible, elantach. J'en suis certaine. »

languages.text: "Asuryan wird sein Kind in dieser dunklen Stunde nicht verlassen, Elantach. Dessen bin ich ganz sicher."
languages.original_text: "Asuryan will not abandon his child in such a dark hour, elantach. I am sure of it."

traits.locale_text: "Asuryan wird sein Kind in dieser dunklen Stunde nicht verlassen, Elantach. Dessen bin ich ganz sicher."

languages.text: 「エランタ、アシュリアンはこのような暗い時に子供を見捨てることはない。そう確信している」
languages.original_text: "Asuryan will not abandon his child in such a dark hour, elantach. I am sure of it."

traits.locale_text: 「エランタ、アシュリアンはこのような暗い時に子供を見捨てることはない。そう確信している」

languages.text: "Asuryan çocuklarını zor zamanda yalnız bırakmaz elantach. Bundan adım gibi eminim."
languages.original_text: "Asuryan will not abandon his child in such a dark hour, elantach. I am sure of it."

traits.locale_text: "Asuryan çocuklarını zor zamanda yalnız bırakmaz elantach. Bundan adım gibi eminim."
